main event: A UFO sighting was reported in Casper, Wyoming on July 25, 1966, involving a triangular-shaped object that moved rapidly through the sky.
interesting points: The object was reported to be metallic and triangular in shape., It was witnessed by an individual supported by the FAA controller., The sighting occurred at 2230 Z with the first sighting at 2140 Z., The object was observed using seven power binoculars and appeared to have no exhaust or sound., A hand-drawn sketch of the object was included in the report.
witness description: a policeman and his wife, and an additional observer
